name.baseName: Material Conveying ; Light Aggregate Concrete Products ; Cement, light aggregates, lime, fly ash, etc. ; Material transportation and storage ; All sizes; NESPS2
物料输送 ; 轻集料混凝土制品 ; 水泥、轻集料、石灰、粉煤灰等 ; 物料输送储存 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 物料输送轻集料混凝土制品过程包括水泥、轻集料、石灰、粉煤灰等物料的运输和储存，适用于建筑行业所有规模的操作。这涉及在将这些原材料混合成混合混凝土产品之前进行移动和暂时保管的任何操作。所述的末端污染控制技术，即布袋过滤器，专门用于控制工业过程中的细颗粒物(PM2.5 - PM10)排放。这些布袋过滤器的技术效率为99.7%，对于需要满足空气质量标准和最小化环境影响的操作至关重要。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码30,三级代码302.0,四级代码3024文件，在完整版文件中第723页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.7，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为99.7，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数（小时/年）/企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isDirect discharge
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是直排。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为轻集料混凝土制品，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标废气量的末端治理技术是/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
